name: Rolling Labyrinth
description:
Use WASD to move around and mouse to shoot. If mouse is not working properly, use arrow keys to aim and use space to start the game and shoot.

When you reach the edge of a room, select a room from the bottom hotbar using the mouse or the corresponding number key.

Each placed room will have 1 or more dice to collect and some enemies to fight.

Collecting dice will add new rooms to your hotbar, overflowing will instead replace a random room.

Touching an enemy will cause you to loose a room, or lose if you do not have any rooms left.

Locate the exit room along a random edge of the map to win. It is possible to get stuck/softlocked so don't be afraid to restart.
